summary: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.
cast: Kate Beckinsale|Gabriel Macht|Tom Skerritt|Columbus Short|Alex O'Loughlin|Shawn Doyle|Joel Keller|Jesse Todd|Arthur Holden|Erin Hicock|Bashar Rahal|Julian Cain|Dennis Keiffer|Andrei Runtso|Roman Varshavsky|Steve Lucescu|Paula Jean Hixson|Craig A. Pinckes|Sean Tucker|Marc James Beauchamp|Nick Villarin|Louis Dionne|Patrick Sabongui|Alex Bisping|Jeremie Campbell|Sarah Murphy-Dyson
title: Terror en la Antártida
